title: Himi 2
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Ko e huafa ‘o Sīsū
Ko e kalofanga
Ki he kakai tu’utamaki
‘I he’enau hia.
2.
‘Oku fa’a fakama’a
Hono ta’ata’a
‘A e pani ‘uli fofō
Fakalaumālie.
3.
‘Oku Folofola ia
Ki he kakai mate,
Pea nau ongo’i leva,
Pea tu’u hake.
4.
Pea nau mo’ui fo’ou
Pea tāfu’ua
‘I he’ene anga ‘ofa,
Ki he halaia.
5.
‘A e kakai ongotuli
Pea mo e noa,
Ke mou kumi mo ongo’i
Ki homou ‘Otua.
6.
‘A e kui, ke mou vakai,
Ki homou Huhu’i,
Pea tu’u ‘o fiefia
‘A e ve’e kovi. *
